actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to provide a special increase (over and above the regular cost-of-living adjustment) in the Federal benefit standard under the supplemental security income program.

summary.text: Amends title XVI (Supplemental Security Income) of the Social Security Act to revise provisions relating to the cost-of-living adjustment to provide for both benefit and income eligibility amount increases.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to provide a special increase (over and above the regular cost-of-living adjustment) in the Federal benefit standard under the supplemental security income program.
